tool.sectionTitle: [JA] Novel Weaver AI: Your Questions Answered
tool.sectionDescription: [JA] Have questions about using the Novel Weaver AI editor? Find answers to common queries below.

general.faqs.question: [JA] What is Novel Weaver AI?
general.faqs.answer: [JA] Novel Weaver AI is an AI-powered web application designed to assist writers in every stage of the novel creation process, from ideation and outlining to chapter writing and revision. It combines structured tools with advanced AI to help you craft compelling stories.

general.faqs.question: [JA] How does the AI help with writing a novel?
general.faqs.answer: [JA] The AI can help brainstorm ideas, suggest plot points, develop characters, generate draft content for chapters based on your prompts, and provide suggestions for revising your work (e.g., improving descriptions, checking consistency, optimizing dialogue).

general.faqs.question: [JA] Is Novel Weaver AI suitable for all genres?
general.faqs.answer: [JA] Yes! While we offer specialized prompts for popular genres like Sci-Fi, Fantasy, and Mystery, the core tools are versatile and can be adapted for any genre you're passionate about. The Custom Meta Prompt Builder (Pro plan) allows even deeper genre customization.

general.faqs.question: [JA] Do I own the content I create with Novel Weaver AI?
general.faqs.answer: [JA] Absolutely. You retain full ownership of all content you create and input into Novel Weaver AI, as well as the narratives generated with AI assistance based on your inputs. We believe your story is yours.

general.faqs.question: [JA] How is my data saved and is it secure?
general.faqs.answer: [JA] Your novel data is primarily saved in your browser's local storage for quick access. While convenient, we strongly recommend frequently using the 'Download Novel' feature to save a .txt backup to your computer. For authenticated users, future updates may include cloud storage options. We are committed to data security, but local storage is inherently tied to your browser.

general.faqs.question: [JA] Can I use Novel Weaver AI for free?
general.faqs.answer: [JA] Yes, we offer a 'Free Weaver' plan with basic features and limitations, perfect for trying out the platform. For more advanced capabilities and fewer restrictions, we offer affordable paid plans.

pricing.faqs.question: [JA] What payment methods do you accept?
pricing.faqs.answer: [JA] We accept major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and other payment methods supported by Gumroad, our payment processing partner.

pricing.faqs.question: [JA] Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
pricing.faqs.answer: [JA] Yes, you can cancel your monthly or yearly subscription at any time. If you cancel, you'll retain access to your plan's features until the end of your current billing period. No refunds are provided for partial periods.

pricing.faqs.question: [JA] What happens if I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
pricing.faqs.answer: [JA] Upgrades are typically effective immediately, with a prorated charge for the new plan. Downgrades take effect at the end ofyour current billing cycle. Specifics are handled by Gumroad's subscription management.

pricing.faqs.question: [JA] Is there a free trial for paid plans?
pricing.faqs.answer: [JA] We offer a comprehensive Free plan that allows you to experience the core functionalities of Novel Weaver AI. We currently do not offer separate time-limited free trials for paid plans.

pricing.faqs.question: [JA] What does 'Limited' vs 'Full' AI Model Access mean?
pricing.faqs.answer: [JA] Free and Lite plans may use standard AI models. Pro plans get access to our premium, more powerful AI models, which can result in higher quality suggestions, more nuanced writing, and better understanding of complex prompts.

pricing.faqs.question: [JA] What is the Custom Meta Prompt Builder?
pricing.faqs.answer: [JA] Available on the Pro plan, this powerful tool allows you to define your own unique story structures, AI instructions, and parameters for novel generation, giving you unparalleled control over the AI's creative process to match very specific needs.

pricing.faqs.question: [JA] Are there any word count limits on paid plans?
pricing.faqs.answer: [JA] The 'Lite Weaver' plan has a generous word count limit per novel (e.g., 50,000 words). The 'Pro Weaver' plan offers unlimited words per novel, allowing you to write epics without restriction.
